紶字的基本解释

紶
qū
继。
束。

紶
qǔ
绪。

紶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qū］
［《玉篇》去魚切］
(1)继，紶继。
(2)束。
(3)“綌”的讹字。
[②]［qǔ］
［《集韻》口舉切，上語，溪。］
绪。

紶字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　紶； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页920第09
【集韻】口舉切，音去。【類篇】緒也。　又【玉篇】去魚切。繼也，束也。　又與蜐通。【荀子·王制篇】東海則有紫紶魚鹽焉。【註】紶，當爲蜐也。

紶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
紶字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qū］
["Jade Chapter" cut the fish]
(1) Succession, succession.
(2) Bundle.
(3) The corrupt word of "綌".
[②] [qǔ]
["Ji Yun" mouth lift cut, upper language, stream. ]
thread.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　紶; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: Page 920 09
[Jiyun] The mouth lifts and cuts, the sound goes. [Class articles] Xu also.　[Jade article] to cut the fish. Following also, beam also.　It is connected with the scorpionfish again. [Xunzi·Wangzhi Chapter] In the East China Sea, there are purple fish with salt. [Note] 紶, as a scorpion.
